tags.name: javascript
tags.description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification.

tags.description: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language known for its readability and simplicity.

tags.name: java
tags.description: Java is a popular general-purpose programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

tags.name: html
tags.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

tags.name: css
tags.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML.

tags.name: c#
tags.description: C# is a general-purpose, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft for the .NET platform.

tags.name: android
tags.description: Android is an open-source mobile operating system developed by Google for smartphones, tablets, and other devices.

tags.name: ios
tags.description: iOS is a mobile operating system developed by Apple Inc. for its iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch devices.
